refsect1.title: Summary
refsect1.para: regrid The regrid operator partitions the cells in the input array into blocks, and for each block, apply a specific aggregate operation over the value(s) of some attribute in each block.

listitem.para: The grids may not span array chunks.
The chunk size must be a multiple of the grid size in each dimension.

informalexample.para: This example divides a 4Ã—4 array into 4 equal partitions and calculates the average of each one. This process is known as spatial averaging.

step.para: Create an array m4x4:--afl CREATE ARRAY m4x4 <val:double> [i=0:3,4,0,j=0:3,4,0]; --show-output=no
Regrid m4x4 into four partitions and find the average of each partition.--afl regrid(m4x4, 2,2, avg(val)); --output-format=dense
